Properties.ProtectedString:
local Tool = script.Parent local Sword = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter local myTorso local myHumanoid
local equipped = false
function waitForChild(parent, instance) while parent:FindFirstChild(instance) == nil do print("Waiting for ", instance) wait() end end
waitForChild(Tool, "Swing") local swing = Tool.Swing
swing.Changed:connect(function() if swing and swing.Value == true and myHumanoid then Tool.Enabled = false myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 29 local theta Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(1, 0, 0) Tool.GripRight = Vector3.new(0, -1, 0) Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(0, 0, 1) Tool.GripPos = Vector3.new(0, 0.5, -2.2) for i = 1, 120 do theta = i%6 * math.pi/3 --Tool.GripRight = Vector3.new(0, -math.sin(theta), math.cos(theta)) Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0, math.cos(theta), math.sin(theta)) Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(0, -math.sin(theta), math.cos(theta)) Tool.GripPos = Vector3.new(0.5, -2, 0) wait() end
myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 16 Tool.GripRight = Vector3.new(1, 0, 0) Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0, 1, 0) Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(0, 0, 1) Tool.GripPos = Vector3.new(0, -2, 0)
wait(4) Tool.Enabled = true wait(4) swing.Value = false end end)
local debris = game:GetService("Debris")
function tagHumanoid(humanoid, player) if humanoid then local creatorTag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creatorTag.Value = player creatorTag.Name = "creator" creatorTag.Parent = humanoid debris:AddItem(creatorTag, 1) end end
function cut(hit) local humanoid local vPlayer if hit and hit.Parent and myHumanoid then if hit.Parent.className == "Hat" then humanoid = hit.Parent.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") else humanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") end vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) if humanoid ~= nil and humanoid ~= myHumanoid then tagHumanoid(humanoid, vPlayer) humanoid:TakeDamage(27) end end end
function onEquipped() if dragonSound then dragonSound:Play() end vCharacter = Tool.Parent myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") equipped = true end
function onUnequipped() if dragonSound then dragonSound:Stop() end equipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)
Sword.Touched:connect(cut)

Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = false
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end print("Setting Mouse to wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

local Tool = script.Parent local Axe = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter local myTorso local myHumanoid
Tool.Enabled = true
local anims = {} local slashAnim local holdAnim
local swing
local lastAttack = 0
local r = game:service("RunService")
function lunge(humanoid, torso) local holdAnim = humanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.RightSlash) if holdAnim then holdAnim:Play() else Tool.Enabled = true return end local target = humanoid.TargetPoint local direction = (target - torso.Position) * Vector3.new(1, 0, 1) newBV = nil if direction.magnitude > .01 then direction = direction.unit newBV = Instance.new("BodyVelocity") newBV.P = 100000 newBV.maxForce = Vector3.new(newBV.P, 0, newBV.P) newBV.velocity = direction * 50 newBV.Parent = torso torso.CFrame = CFrame.new(torso.Position, target * Vector3.new(1, 0, 1) + Vector3.new(0, torso.Position.Y, 0)) end wait(.75) if newBV ~= nil then newBV:remove() end wait(.5)
end
function wave(key) if key:lower() == "q" then swing = Tool:FindFirstChild("Swing") if swing and swing.Value == false then swing.Value = true end end end
function onActivated() if Tool.Enabled == false then return end
vCharacter = Tool.Parent myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid")
if myTorso == nil or myHumanoid == nil then return end
Tool.Enabled = false tick() anims = {Tool:FindFirstChild("RightSlash"), Tool:FindFirstChild("Slash"), Tool:FindFirstChild("SlashAnim"), Tool:FindFirstChild("SlashAnim"), Tool:FindFirstChild("SlashAnim")} local num = anims[math.random(1, #anims)] print(num) local t = r.Stepped:wait() if (t - lastAttack < 0.2) then lunge(myHumanoid, myTorso) else slashAnim = myHumanoid:LoadAnimation(num) if slashAnim then slashAnim:Play() end end lastAttack = t
Tool.Enabled = true end
function onEquipped(mouse) anims = {Tool:FindFirstChild("RightSlash"), Tool:FindFirstChild("Slash"), Tool:FindFirstChild("SlashAnim"), Tool:FindFirstChild("SlashAnim"), Tool:FindFirstChild("SlashAnim")} print(#anims) if mouse then mouse.KeyDown:connect(wave) end end
function onUnequipped() if slashAnim then slashAnim:Stop() end if holdAnim then holdAnim:Play() end end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)
